title: Brian Flores Lawsuit, MLB Lockout
itunes:title: Brian Flores Lawsuit, MLB Lockout
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch are joined by Martin Edel, Goulston & Storrs Sports Law Practice Co-Chair and Columbia Law Professor. They discuss former Miami Dolphins head coach Brian Flores's lawsuit accusing the NFL and teams of violating civil rights laws, and where things stand with the lockout in Major League Baseball.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
